project_abstract.cdata: The project is part of the Government's and the provinces' 1983-86 Four-Year Highway Investment Program. The program components supported by the proposed loan are: construction, reconstruction and improvements of federal highways and urban bypasses and provincial roads; road marking, signing and betterment subprojects; traffic counting equipment; and consultants' services for technical assistance. The project will help: (a) prevent further deterioration of aged pavements; (b) alleviate urban congestion; (c) promote traffic safety; (d) assist in the transfer of technology to the provinces; (e) promote improved sector policies; and (f) strengthen local capabilities to plan and manage sector programs.
